quote.issuer_name: Guoquan Food (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: Guoquan Food (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: Guoquan Food Shanghai Co Ltd is a China-based company principally engaged in the retail of meal products for eating at home. Meal products for eating at home are the fourth dining option in addition to buying groceries and cooking at home, dine-in at restaurants and takeaways from restaurants. The Company offers a variety of ready-to-eat, ready-to-heat, ready-to-cook and prepared ingredients, with a focus on at-home hotpot and barbecue products. The Company offers the brand Guoquan Shihui. The Company's product portfolio comprises eight categories including hotpot products, barbecue products, beverages, solo-dining meals, ready-to-cook meal kits, fresh produce, western cuisines and snacks. The Company provides online and offline shopping experiences. The Company mainly conducts its businesses in the Chinese markets.
